name: Web Dev Path
description: It's is an open source project that aims to provide a comprehensive path for tech professionals to work in a team environment.
I have been colaborating with the team, commiting code, discuting solutions, and helping the project to achive their goals.
techStack: Next.js, React, Mailchimp, SendEmail, GoogleRecaptcha, and so on.

name: Clockin.js
description: It allows you to have all your clients data, their clockins and invoices, in one place.
It presents an easy and straightforward workflow to control clockins and invoices.
techStack: React, MongoDB, Bootstrap, Redux, JSON Web Token.

name: Home Seeker
description: An automated system to web scrape information from Craigslist about rentals availability.
It helped my wife and I to find our new home, quickly and easily receiving emails to shortcut our search.
Mission accomplished and happy new homers! üè†üòä
techStack: Node.js, React, Atlas MongoDB, Node-Mailer, CSS, and React-Modal.

name: CRUD
